title: Why are the data provided by scaffold_datasets/qm9 different from the data downloaded from the moleculeNet official website? Has it been converted in some way?
author: zyrlia1018
body: Why are the data provided by scaffold_datasets/qm9 different from the data downloaded from the moleculeNet official website? Has it been converted in some way?

comments.body:
Hi Zyrlia1018, 

Thank you for the interest to our paper.

Yes, we have adopted random splitting to create the dataset split. The detailed description is mentioned in the "Method" section "Experimental settings"--"Splitting datasets." We follow the same setting as MolCLR "https://www.nature.com/articles/s42256-022-00447-x".

title: Unable to reproduce the results for the HIV dataset.
author: HHW-zhou
body: Thank you for your intriguing work. However, based on the provided code, I am unable to reproduce the results for the HIV dataset. Could you please provide the experimental setup for the HIV dataset?
